lines.line:
#Mipa
Oh! Pretty high wall!
But, I am can hop enough to get there!
#None
Press ① button to jump.

#Mipa
The passage is blocked. But I think I can try to move this box.
#None
Keep moving on a box to push it.

#Mipa
OH! Button!
What does it do?
There only one way to check this out!
#None
Press ③ to interact with buttons and switches.

#Mipa
This door is locked...
#Mipa
Should be the way to open it!

#Mipa
This box cound be helpful to get on this height.
I can try to use my Manget Hand to pull that box.
#None
Press and hold ② button to use Magnet hand.

#Mipa
There is two indicators above this door...
...
Looks like more than one button need to be pressed to open the door.

#Mipa
The laser below looks very unfriendly.
Need to find way to disable it.

#Note
Expedition Log Number 0.
The rooms here are arranged in a strange way.
All traps and puzzles are simply reset to their default state once new visitor is come in.
Interesting security system design.
#Mipa
... ... ... ...

#Note
Expedition Log Number 1.
These rays, or more accurately lasers, have odd structure.
Their power is high enough to destroy metal. But nevertheless, walls and boxes block radiation.
Wall and boxes materials cannot be defined.
#Mipa
Oh...
Well, at least I already know that lasers are bad, and boxes are good!

#Mipa
Hello?
..........
#Poky
Ssshhhhhhhh!
..........
Let me enjoy sound of azure waterfall
#Mipa
Is it really azure?
#Poky
Of course it is!
How can not you see it?
#Mipa
OH! Sorry, my visors seeing everything in monochrome...

#Mipa
Are you sure your sprites are final?
#Jobee
No idea..!
Do I look good?
#Mipa
Well....
... ... ...
...
. . . . .
#Jobee
I see...
